panels.description:
Number of leaked OpenStack servers.
Leaked here means server instances that do not have a matching Machine resource.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        COUNT(s.id) AS total
FROM openstack_orphan_server AS s
JOIN openstack_project as p
ON s.project_id = p.project_id
WHERE p.name in ($openstack_project);

panels.title: Number of Leaked Servers

panels.description:
Number of servers using images that aren't listed in their respective cloud profile.
Only looks at non-leaked servers.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(oumi.server_id) FROM openstack_unknown_machine_image as oumi
JOIN openstack_project as p
ON oumi.project_id = p.project_id
WHERE p.name in ($openstack_project);

panels.title: Servers with unknown images

panels.description:
List of leaked OpenStack servers.
Leaked here means not mapped to a Machine resource.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT s.*
FROM openstack_orphan_server AS s
JOIN openstack_project as p
ON s.project_id = p.project_id
WHERE p.name in ($openstack_project);

panels.title: Leaked Servers

panels.description:
List of OpenStack Server using images not specified in their respective Cloud Profile.
Only looks at non-leaked servers.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT oumi.*
FROM openstack_unknown_machine_image as oumi
JOIN openstack_project as p
ON oumi.project_id = p.project_id
WHERE p.name in ($openstack_project);

panels.title: Servers with Unknown Images

panels.description:
Number of leaked OpenStack Networks.
Does not include externally managed networks.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        COUNT(n.name) AS total
FROM openstack_orphan_network AS n
JOIN openstack_project as p
ON n.project_id = p.project_id
WHERE p.name in ($openstack_project);

panels.title: Number of Leaked Networks

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(s.subnet_id) FROM openstack_orphan_subnet as s
JOIN openstack_project as p
ON s.project_id = p.project_id
WHERE p.name in ($openstack_project);

panels.description:
Leaked OpenStack Networks.
Does not include externally managed networks.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        n.*
FROM openstack_orphan_network as n
JOIN openstack_project as p
ON n.project_id = p.project_id
WHERE p.name in ($openstack_project);

panels.title: Leaked Networks

targets.rawSql:
SELECT s.* as project_name 
FROM openstack_orphan_subnet as s
JOIN openstack_project as p
ON s.project_id = p.project_id
WHERE p.name in ($openstack_project);

panels.description: Number of OpenStack Load Balancers which are linked to an orphaned network.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM openstack_orphan_loadbalancer as lb
JOIN openstack_project as p
ON lb.project_id = p.project_id
WHERE p.name in ($openstack_project);

panels.title: Orphaned Load Balancers

panels.description: Number of public (floating) IPs which are linked to leaked networks.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM openstack_orphan_floating_ip as ip
JOIN openstack_project as p
ON ip.project_id = p.project_id
WHERE p.name in ($openstack_project);

panels.title: Number of Leaked Public (Floating) IPs

panels.description: Number of OpenStack Pools which don't have mapped servers and are linked to an active shoot.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM openstack_orphan_pool as pool
JOIN openstack_project as p
ON pool.project_id = p.project_id
WHERE p.name in ($openstack_project);

panels.title: Orphaned Pool

panels.description: Number of OpenStack Pool Members which don't have a mapped server and are linked to an active shoot.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM openstack_orphan_pool_member as pm
JOIN openstack_project as p
ON pm.project_id = p.project_id
WHERE p.name in ($openstack_project);

panels.title: Orphaned Pool Member

panels.description: List of LBs which are linked to orphaned networks.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  lb.*,
  p.name as project_name
FROM openstack_orphan_loadbalancer as lb
JOIN openstack_project as p
ON lb.project_id = p.project_id
WHERE p.name in ($openstack_project);

panels.title: Orphan Load Balancers

panels.description: List of IPs which are linked with an orphan network.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  ip.*,
  p.name as project_name
FROM openstack_orphan_floating_ip as ip
JOIN openstack_project as p
ON ip.project_id = p.project_id
WHERE p.name in ($openstack_project);

panels.title: Orphan floating (public) IPs

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  pool.*,
  p.name as project_name
FROM openstack_orphan_pool as pool
JOIN openstack_project as p
ON pool.project_id = p.project_id
WHERE p.name in ($openstack_project);

panels.description: List of Pools Members, missing attached servers.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  pm.*,
  p.name as project_name
FROM openstack_orphan_pool_member as pm
JOIN openstack_project as p
ON pm.project_id = p.project_id
WHERE p.name in ($openstack_project);

panels.title: Orphan Pools Members

panels.description:
Number of leaked OpenStack servers.
Leaked here means server instances that do not have a matching Machine resource.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        COUNT(c.name) AS total
FROM openstack_orphan_container AS c
JOIN openstack_project as p
ON c.project_id = p.project_id
WHERE p.name in ($openstack_project);

panels.title: Number of Leaked Containers

targets.rawSql:
SELECT c.*
FROM openstack_orphan_container AS c
JOIN openstack_project as p
ON c.project_id = p.project_id
WHERE p.name in ($openstack_project);

list.description: List of the names of openstack projects  currently collected in the DB.
list.name: openstack_project
